name: AVMutableMetadataItem
desc: A mutable metadata item for an audiovisual asset or for one of its tracks.

items.name: var identifier: AVMetadataIdentifier?
items.desc: Indicates the identifier of the metadata item.

items.name: var key: (NSCopying & NSObjectProtocol)?
items.desc: The key for a mutable metadata item.

items.name: var keySpace: AVMetadataKeySpace?
items.desc: The key space of the metadata item’s key.

items.name: var value: (NSCopying & NSObjectProtocol)?
items.desc: The value for the mutable metadata item.

items.name: var extraAttributes: [AVMetadataExtraAttributeKey : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary of additional attributes for a metadata item.

items.name: var dataType: String?
items.desc: The data type of the metadata item’s value.

items.name: var time: CMTime
items.desc: The timestamp for a mutable metadata item.

items.name: var startDate: Date?
items.desc: The start date of the timed metadata.

items.name: var duration: CMTime
items.desc: The duration of a mutable metadata item.

items.name: var locale: Locale?
items.desc: The locale for a mutable metadata item.

items.name: var extendedLanguageTag: String?
items.desc: The IETF BCP 47 (RFC 4646) language identifier of the metadata item.
